label: backup
name: Backup
description: Tools to manage the backup of files and directories

label: calc
name: Calculators
description: Calculators for mathematical operations among numbers, dates, base conversions, etc.

label: chat
name: Chat and instant messaging
description: Clients for chat and other instant messaging protocols, e.g., IRC, Discord, Mattermost, Matrix, Slack, Telegram, Reddit

label: cheatsheet
name: Commands cheatsheet and snippets
description: Tools to manage often used commands, code snippets, and alternative manual pages

label: conversion
name: Conversion
description: File format converters

label: data-management
name: Data management
description: Tools to manage data files

label: data-management-json
name: Data management - JSON/YAML/etc.
description: Tools to manage data files, dedicated to JSON, YAML and other similar formats

label: data-management-tabular
name: Data management - Tabular data
description: Tools to manage tabular data files, such as CSV, spreadsheets, and database tables

label: transfer
name: Data transfer
description: Programs for transferring files and data between different machines

label: cd
name: Directory changers (alternatives to cd)
description: Programs for improving the efficiency of directory traversal by remembering common paths and other approaches; alternatives to the `cd` command

label: ai
name: AI / ChatGPT
description: Interfaces and front-ends to GPT engines and other tools powered by artificial intelligence and Natural Language Processing

label: copilot
name: Co-pilot
description: Programs that use GPT and GPT-like engines to generate commands at the command line or code in general from natural language

label: devops
name: DevOps
description: Applications for supporting DevOps tasks, such as containers or cloud systems management

label: diff
name: Diff
description: Calculation of diffs between files and data, even with context or semantic awareness (i.e., considering the meaning of the data)

label: disk-analyzer
name: Disk usage analyzers
description: Programs to analyze and summarize the usage of disks, visualize and report the size of directories and sub-directories, etc.

label: editors
name: Editors
description: Text editors

label: email
name: Email
description: Email clients (MUA - Mail User Agents), mail synchronization, generation indexing and search

label: file-dir-cleanup
name: Clean up of files and directories
description: Find/remove duplicate files, automatically organize files, etc.

label: file-explorer
name: File explorer and tree visualization
description: Show directory trees and navigate through the file system (but not full featured file managers)

label: find
name: File finding (alternatives to find)
description: Search the filesystem looking for files with specific characteristics, e.g., names; alternatives to `find`

label: file-handling
name: File and file system handling
description: Tools for managing files and directories (copy, move, extraction from compressed archives, change permissions, etc.)

label: file-watch
name: File watching for changes
description: Services that watch files for changes and perform actions when something happens

label: ls
name: File listing (alternatives to ls)
description: List directory content and files, with colors or icons; alternatives to `ls`

label: file-manager
name: File manager
description: Applications for interactively managing files and directories

label: file-renamer
name: File renamers
description: Utilities to rename files and directories: address multiple items with one command, interactively edit the name within an editor, etc.

label: file-system
name: File systems
description: File systems with specific features; e.g., the possibility to add tags and labels to files

label: financial
name: Financial tools
description: Personal ledger trackers, currency converters, and tools to manage and track cryptocurrencies

label: flashcard
name: Anki, decks and flashcards
description: Manage decks of flashcards and Anki decks

label: font
name: Font management
description: Utilities to manage system fonts and to generate text using ASCII-art-like characters

label: funny
name: Funny tools
description: Miscellaneous of tools that provide some funny/aesthetical functionality (animations, funny quotes, original message visualization, etc.)

label: fuzzy-finder
name: Fuzzy finders
description: Fuzzy finders and generic option pickers in lists of strings

label: games
name: Games
description: Board games, puzzles, roguelikes, role-play, adventures, card games, etc.

label: git
name: Git and accessories
description: Tools to support and extend the functionalities of the `git` version tracker

label: graphics
name: Graphics
description: Applications to process images, colors and ASCII art

label: history
name: History management
description: Programs to replace or improve the management of command line history

label: launcher
name: Command launchers
description: Applications to launch/execute programs, either interactively, automatically, in parallel, etc.

label: markdown
name: Markdown
description: Utilities to display, convert and reformat Markdown files

label: video
name: Video
description: Programs to process and manage video files (downloader, editing, players, etc.)

label: networking
name: Networking
description: Networks and communication tools: bandwidth monitoring, packet inspection, remote connection, VPNs, terminal sharing, etc.

label: note-taking
name: Note taking
description: Tools to take, organize and manage notes

label: office
name: Office tools
description: Programs to manage spreadsheets and to make presentations

label: organizers
name: Organizers and calendars
description: Calendar and appointment managers

label: online
name: Online search and resources
description: Tools that interact with online resources to provide their services, e.g., searches, wiki, etc.

label: package-manager
name: Package managers
description: Package managers to manage/install/uninstall software packages, as source code or binaries

label: password-manager
name: Password managers
description: Programs to store and manage collections of password and other login/authentication information

label: productivity
name: Productivity
description: Applications for improving own productivity that do not deserve (at the moment) a specific category; e.g., resume generators and mind maps

label: programming
name: Programming
description: Tools for developers, including debuggers, testing, line counters, boilerplate and license generators, etc.

label: prompt
name: Prompts
description: Prompts and welcome messages at the command line

label: religion
name: Religion
description: Tools to handle religious material, e.g. reading the Holy Bible

label: rss
name: RSS
description: RSS feed visualizers, converters and managers

label: science
name: Science
description: Packages for scientific research and science applications, e.g., bibliography and publication management

label: security
name: Security and encryption
description: Cryptography, ciphered archive managers, encrypted file-systems

label: shells
name: Shells
description: Shell programs that enable the interaction through the terminal

label: music
name: Sound and music
description: Music players, podcast, synthesizers, downloaders, online radios

label: monitor
name: System monitoring
description: Applications to display the usage of system resources: network, memory, power, etc.

label: monitor-top
name: Process viewers and monitoring (alternatives to top)
description: Programs to list and monitor currently running processes; alternatives to the `top` command

label: screen-recorder
name: Screen recorder
description: Tools to record the content of the terminal and manage the recording (e.g., converting into animated GIFs)

label: screensaver
name: Screen savers
description: Screen savers with animations for the idle times of the computer

label: system
name: System tools
description: System management tools, such as for brightness control, dotfile and environment variable management, notifications, etc.

label: terminal
name: Terminals
description: Terminal and terminal multiplexers

label: text-processing
name: Text processing
description: Text processing utilities to cut or sort lines, find dead links, colorize command output, etc.

label: text-search
name: Text search (alternatives to grep)
description: Search files and exploring directory trees to look for text or patterns (RegEx) contained in files; alternatives to the `grep` command

label: text-search-replace
name: Text search and replace (alternatives to sed)
description: Tools to search text within files and perform operations on it, such as text replacement; alternatives to `sed`

label: time-tracker
name: Time trackers
description: Time and habit trackers to measure the amount of time spent on different activities

label: typing
name: Typing test and practice
description: Games and utilities to measure and/or improve the typing ability

label: rm
name: File deletion and trash bin (alternatives to rm)
description: Tools to manage the deletion of files/directories, often with the support of a trash can, i.e., the ability to restore deleted items

label: todo-manager
name: Todo managers
description: Todo list and task managers

label: torrent
name: Torrent
description: Clients and download managers using the BitTorrent protocol

label: utility
name: Utilities
description: Miscellaneous utilities that are not do not fit in other categories and they are not numerous enough that they do not require a dedicated category

label: versioning
name: Versioning
description: Tools for file versioning that are not related to git

label: viewers
name: Viewers
description: File viewers for images and other formats (e.g., e-books)

label: browser
name: Web browser
description: Web browsers with textual interface

label: webdev
name: Web development
description: Web development tools, including load test tools, API clients and managers, link checkers and extractors, etc.

label: writing
name: Writing
description: Tools to assist the writing of text and documents, including translation, spell checking, etc.
